0.1.2 (2023-09-15)
==================
- Using default Imviz name for NOVT configuration, to enable new plugin use.

0.1.1 (2023-07-17)
==================
- Blocked image removal or reload after successful upload, due to limited support in
  Imviz for data removal.

==================
Initial release.
